news.title: 2005.0 CDs now available through the Gentoo Foundation store

body.p: The Gentoo Foundation is now offering 2005.0 CD releases through the Gentoo Linux store. CDs are available for purchase for x86, ppc, sparc64, and amd64/em64t, and $5 of each CD sale goes directly to the Gentoo Foundation. While CDs are the highlight of the store, the store also offers Gentoo clothing items and various things like posters, stickers, and mousepads.
